data.lyric:
[ti:Put On A Smile]
[ar:Bruno Mars/Anderson .Paak/Silk Sonic]
[al:An Evening With Silk Sonic (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Put On A Smile - Bruno Mars (布鲁诺·马尔斯)/Anderson .Paak/Silk Sonic
[00:00.34]Lyrics by：Bruno Mars/Brandon Anderson/Dernst Emile II
[00:00.69]Bootsy Collins/Bruno Mars：
[00:00.83]Oh lookie here fellas
[00:01.74]
[00:02.40]Take it from your Uncle Bootsy
[00:03.55]
[00:04.32]Ain't no shame beggin' in the rain
[00:06.05]
[00:06.66]Tell her how you really feel
[00:08.27]
[00:10.79]Ooh ooh-ooh
[00:14.72]
[00:16.02]Ooh-ooh-ooh-ooh ooh
[00:19.92]
[00:20.96]Anderson .Paak：
[00:21.78]
[00:23.64]I could pretend when I'm out with my friends
[00:26.31]I ain't thinkin' about you
[00:28.65]
[00:30.33]I could pretend like I ain't in my feelings
[00:33.56]But that ain't true nah
[00:36.58]Nah
[00:37.31]When I called you out your name
[00:39.58]
[00:40.25]That was my ego my pride and pain
[00:43.03]
[00:43.53]I should be a movie star
[00:45.59]The way I play the part like everything's okay
[00:48.71]Bruno Mars/Anderson .Paak：
[00:49.26]Oh now I try to be the life of the party
[00:52.54]All night buying shots for everybody
[00:55.99]But it's all just an act
[00:57.23]Yeah
[00:57.43]'Cause I can't have you back
[00:58.90]Yeah
[00:59.26]Without you I've been goin' crazy
[01:02.20]Tryna put on a smile
[01:04.52]Put on a smile
[01:07.65]
[01:08.90]Tryna fight these tears from cryin'
[01:12.16]But Lord knows I'm dyin' dyin'
[01:15.78]Tryna put on a smile smile
[01:18.62]Put on a smile
[01:20.94]
[01:21.67]Ooh out here smilin' like a fool
[01:24.61]
[01:25.54]When the only thing worth smilin' for
[01:28.92]Baby girl the only thing worth smilin' for was
[01:32.89]
[01:33.62]You you you
[01:38.44]
[01:39.33]You you you you you
[01:42.78]
[01:43.40]You
[01:46.41]Anderson .Paak：
[01:47.04]If I could turn back the hands on my Rollie you know I would
[01:51.61]
[01:53.55]I would've spent all my time makin' sure that my baby good
[01:58.45]
[01:59.12]I'm tryin' hard to hide the shame
[02:02.84]
[02:03.88]I know I'm playin' a dangerous game
[02:06.18]
[02:06.79]But since you been gone I ain't been the same
[02:10.06]There's only so much a man can fake
[02:11.98]Bruno Mars/Anderson .Paak：
[02:12.51]Oh now I try to be the life of the party
[02:15.81]All night buying shots for everybody
[02:19.22]But it's all just an act
[02:20.62]Yeah
[02:20.85]'Cause I can't have you back
[02:22.23]Yeah
[02:22.49]Without you I've been goin' crazy
[02:25.65]Tryna put on a smile
[02:27.67]Put on a smile
[02:31.73]
[02:32.26]Tryna fight these tears from cryin'
[02:35.43]But Lord knows I'm dyin' dyin'
[02:38.97]Tryna put on a smile
[02:41.16]Put on a smile
[02:44.25]Baby out here smilin' like a fool
[02:48.19]
[02:48.97]When the only thing worth smilin' for
[02:52.28]Baby you're the only thing worth smilin' for
[02:55.53]When the only thing worth smilin' for
[02:58.95]Baby girl the only thing worth smilin' for was
[03:02.68]
[03:03.53]You you you
[03:14.54]
[03:15.51]I'm tryna put on a smile
[03:18.00]Put on a smile
[03:19.99]Oh-oh tryna fight these tears from cryin'
[03:25.39]But Lord knows I'm dyin'
[03:31.21]Put on a smile
[03:35.59]I'm smilin' like a fool
[03:39.03]When the only thing worth smilin' for
[03:42.03]Baby you're the only thing worth smilin' for
[03:45.51]When the only thing worth smilin' for
[03:48.93]Oh the only thing worth smilin' for was
[03:52.98]
[03:53.49]You you you
[03:58.41]
[03:59.31]You you you you you
data.trans:
[ti:Put On A Smile]
[ar:Bruno Mars/Anderson .Paak/Silk Sonic]
[al:An Evening With Silk Sonic (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.34]//
[00:00.69]//
[00:00.83]瞧这里 伙计们
[00:01.74]
[00:02.40]就如 Uncle Bootsy 说的那般
[00:03.55]
[00:04.32]在雨中苦苦恳求 没什么可耻的
[00:06.05]
[00:06.66]告诉她你的真实感受
[00:08.27]
[00:10.79]//
[00:14.72]
[00:16.02]//
[00:19.92]
[00:20.96]//
[00:21.78]
[00:23.64]当我与朋友们出去玩 我能够佯装
[00:26.31]我没有想着你
[00:28.65]
[00:30.33]我能够假装 我没有沉浸在情绪中
[00:33.56]但那不是真的
[00:36.58]不是
[00:37.31]当我呼喊你的名字
[00:39.58]
[00:40.25]我放下了我的自尊 我感受到痛苦
[00:43.03]
[00:43.53]我应该是一位影星
[00:45.59]我的一举一动 仿佛一切安然无恙
[00:48.71]//
[00:49.26]此刻的我试着成为焦点人物
[00:52.54]彻夜请所有人喝酒
[00:55.99]但这只是逢场作戏
[00:57.23]//
[00:57.43]因为我不能够让你回到我的身边
[00:58.90]//
[00:59.26]没有你在身旁 我快陷入疯狂
[01:02.20]试着扬起嘴角
[01:04.52]扬起嘴角微笑
[01:07.65]
[01:08.90]试着抑制我的泪水
[01:12.16]但上帝知道我心如刀割
[01:15.78]试着扬起嘴角
[01:18.62]扬起嘴角微笑
[01:20.94]
[01:21.67]无法停止微笑 
[01:24.61]
[01:25.54]当你是唯一值得让我微笑的人时
[01:28.92]宝贝女孩 唯一值得让我微笑的是
[01:32.89]
[01:33.62]是你 是你 是你
[01:38.44]
[01:39.33]是你 是你 是你 是你 是你
[01:42.78]
[01:43.40]是你
[01:46.41]//
[01:47.04]若是我能扭转时间 拨动我劳力士表的指针 你知道我会如此
[01:51.61]
[01:53.55]我愿献上我的所有时间 让我宝贝感到幸福
[01:58.45]
[01:59.12]我试着将愧疚深藏于心
[02:02.84]
[02:03.88]我知道我在玩一个危险游戏
[02:06.18]
[02:06.79]但自从你离我而去 我就不是以往那般模样
[02:10.06]我无法再佯装下去
[02:11.98]//
[02:12.51]此刻的我试着成为焦点人物
[02:15.81]彻夜请所有人喝酒
[02:19.22]但这只是逢场作戏
[02:20.62]//
[02:20.85]因为我不能够让你回到我的身边
[02:22.23]//
[02:22.49]没有你在身旁 我快陷入疯狂
[02:25.65]试着扬起嘴角
[02:27.67]扬起嘴角微笑
[02:31.73]
[02:32.26]试着抑制我的泪水
[02:35.43]但上帝知道我心如刀割
[02:38.97]试着扬起嘴角
[02:41.16]扬起嘴角微笑
[02:44.25]宝贝 无法停止微笑 
[02:48.19]
[02:48.97]当你是唯一值得让我微笑的人时
[02:52.28]唯一值得让我微笑的是你啊 宝贝
[02:55.53]当你是唯一值得让我微笑的人时
[02:58.95]宝贝女孩 唯一值得让我微笑的是
[03:02.68]
[03:03.53]是你 是你 是你
[03:14.54]
[03:15.51]试着扬起嘴角
[03:18.00]扬起嘴角微笑
[03:19.99]试着抑制我的泪水
[03:25.39]但上帝知道我心如刀割
[03:31.21]扬起嘴角微笑
[03:35.59]为你沉沦 我无法停止微笑 
[03:39.03]当你是唯一值得让我微笑的人时
[03:42.03]唯一值得让我微笑的是你啊 宝贝
[03:45.51]当你是唯一值得让我微笑的人时
[03:48.93]唯一值得让我微笑的是
[03:52.98]
[03:53.49]是你 是你 是你
[03:58.41]
[03:59.31]是你 是你 是你 是你 是你
